title: Twisted Treeline - more availability each week
body:
Hey everyone but esp riot staff if you read this. 
My favourite map is twisted tree line and I cant wait till it comes on line in Oceania Thursday to Saturday after 3 PM. I would love for it to be available for more time each week as it is very popular and queue times are always good. Even if it was for an extra day or two per week it would be amazing. Would love to hear if there was more who want this to happen and whether we can get enough support from riot to do it. 
Thanks guys.

replies.body: but if you put in more days for twisted treeline... THEN THERE IS NO ANTICIPATION ;-;
Haha that is true :P but they could at least extend it to Sunday surely :/
I would be happier for there to be Ranked available when it is currently open rather than it just be open for more days unranked.
Mm ranked would be great as well.
